3 namespace Ubiquity\utils\http\session;
4 
14 class PhpSession extends AbstractSession {
15 
16  public function set($key, $value) {
17  return $_SESSION [$key] = $value;
18  }
19 
20  public function get($key, $default = null) {
21  return $_SESSION [$key] ?? $default;
22  }
23 
24  public function start($name = null) {
25  if (! $this->isStarted ()) {
26  if (isset ( $name ) && $name !== "") {
27  $this->name = $name;
28  }
29  if (isset ( $this->name )) {
30  \session_name ( $this->name );
31  }
32  \session_start ();
33  }
34  }
35 
36  public function terminate() {
37  if (! $this->isStarted ())
38  return;
39  $this->start ();
40  $_SESSION = array ();
41 
42  if (\ini_get ( "session.use_cookies" )) {
43  $params = \session_get_cookie_params ();
44  \setcookie ( \session_name (), '', \time () - 42000, $params ["path"], $params ["domain"], $params ["secure"], $params ["httponly"] );
45  }
46  \session_destroy ();
47  }
48 
49  public function isStarted() {
50  return session_status () == PHP_SESSION_ACTIVE;
51  }
52 
53  public function exists($key) {
54  return isset ( $_SESSION [$key] );
55  }
56 
57  public function getAll() {
58  return $_SESSION;
59  }
60 
61  public function delete($key) {
62  unset ( $_SESSION [$key] );
63  }
64 }
